title: Wine
lyrics:
Wainjan-e uli gieog-i damgyeo
Biwonaelsulog jeomjeom meol-eojyeo
Ssod-abeoligo
Kkaeeonan hue
Ijen da jiullae

Hollo nuwo geunal sog-e jamgyeo

Sajin ap-e naega nun-eul gam-eo

Jabgo sipjin anh-a

Geunyang idaelo

Geunal sog-e ulin

Ije deoneun eobs-eo

Jigeum naleul bwa now

Chueogdeul-eun modu masyeo eobs-eo

You used to say



Hyang-gi jitdeon geu bamgwa

So much pain I put you through

Jiulyeo nolyeoghaedo

Deo jinhage nam-ass-eo



Deo isang

Chaj-ji anh-a

Girl I won’t let you

Dol-aol pil-yodo eobs-eo



Bin jan-e goyeossdeon gieogdeul

Eoneusae ppaleuge biwoss-eo

Girl you better realize

Ijen neomu neuj-eoss-eo

Dwidol-aseo eoseo leave me



Nalkalobdeon neoui nun

Kkaejyeobeolin huui na

Naege nam-eun neoui red wine

Sangcheoe dah-a sseugiman hangeol



Malhaessjanh-a nan imi

Geunyang idaeloga deo johdago

Meon husnal-ui uli

Yagsog-eun da jiwo



Jigeum naleul bwa now

Chueogdeul-eun modu masyeoeobs-eo

You used to say



Hyang-gi jitdeon geu bamgwa

So much pain I put you through

Jiulyeo nolyeoghaedo

Deo jinhage nam-ass-eo



Deo isang

Chaj-ji anh-a

Girl I won’t let you

Dol-aol pil-yodo eobs-eo



Bin jan-e goyeossdeon gieogdeul

Eoneusae ppaleuge biwoss-eo

Girl you better realize

Ijen neomu neuj-eoss-eo

Dwidol-aseo eoseo leave me



Uli chueog-eun

Kkaejyeobeolin geol

Look at this shattered glasses

There’s no going back
